title: Himi 475
lyrics:
7.7.7.7.loua
1.
Monū ē ka lau ki muʻa
Hoto tauhi he ‘Otua!
‘Ene faka’uha mai
‘Ene ngaahi tāpuaki,
Tuku hifo hato ka’ate,
Tala ke nau hapai hake,
Hoto kainga, tamai, faʻe,
Mei ‘Otua kotoa pē.
2.
He fonua ke nofo’anga,
He musie mōta fala,
He ‘atā mo ‘ato fale,
‘Ene fai kotoa pē.
Hota kofu na’a Ne ngaohi,
‘Ana ‘eta me’a tokoni
‘Oku tō mei langi ē
‘A e lelei ni fulipē.
3.
Pea tau ‘atu ni kotoa
Fakafeta’i he maʻu koloa.
Te tau fai ki si’a kāinga,
Huanoa ‘a e ‘Eiki na.
Pea tau tui te Ne lava
‘Etau ngaahi faingata’a,
‘O tau nofo fiefia,
Taau mo hotau monū’ia.*
